main event: An object was observed traveling at high speed and maneuvering characteristics in Milroy, Indiana on November 15, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as white or silver in color and oblong in shape., It was estimated to be 200-300 ft in diameter and surrounded by a bright orange glow., The sighting lasted for approximately 3-4 minutes., The object made no sound during its flight., Multiple witnesses, including an Air Force radar operator, reported similar sightings.
sighted object: an oblong, white or silver object
witness description: a couple driving through Milroy, Indiana
